scene.name: Tangram puzzle setup
scene.description: A table with a set of 7 tangram pieces scattered

task.name: Assemble and disassemble Tangram
task.description: Assemble the scattered pieces into a square shape and then scatter them back
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will play Tangram. The goal is to assemble the pieces into a square, and then scatter them.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要玩七巧板。目标是将这些碎片拼成一个正方形，然后再把它们打乱。

subtasks.description: Execute the assembly and disassembly sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please assemble the square and then disassemble it.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请拼出正方形，然后再拆开。

steps.description: Assemble the 7 pieces into a square
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the pieces and arrange them into a complete square.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起七巧板碎片，将它们拼成一个完整的正方形。

steps.description: Disassemble the square and scatter pieces
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: separate the pieces and scatter them back on the table.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：把拼好的正方形拆开，将碎片散乱地放回桌面上。

constraints.notes: The square in Step 1 must be formed without overlapping pieces and without gaps; Step 2 should result in a scattered state.
